name: JewelHeart(prototype)
description:
Thank you for opening this page!

This game like a monster farm 2
It's a game that nurtures your monster and aims to become the world's best butler!

And this time we developed a prototype version!
This prototype game was made only
(battle system) 

Let's have a light psychological warfare battle with your opponent with monsters you grew up! ! It is a game rule aimed

As a result of making the rules as simple as possible for players to make them familiar with the game rules, this game has become a game that is not very interesting(´ω`) ...

I just want to change this game rule but I do not have that power
_(｣「ε:)_

So I want a lot of opinions!

 find interesting places in this game, a boring place, I want to improve and complete this game

We are waiting for your comments by all means
